'''Brandon Hoàng''' is an American author best known for his novel {{w|Gloria Buenrostro is Not My Girlfriend}}; before becoming a writer he spent 10 years as an animation executive and still works as a writer for television.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.brandonhoangwrites.com/|title=Brandon Hoàng}}</ref> Most of his work pertains to Vietnamese culture, and within the ''Minecraft'' community he is known for being the author of the novel [[Minecraft: One Last Quest]].

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
One Last Quest was released on October 21, 2025, and is the 22nd ''Minecraft'' [[novel]]. Hoàng writes on the book's premise: "what if a tightly knit group of friends who played Minecraft together were drifting apart? And what if a stranger came into their world and blew it all up?"<ref>{{Citation|url=https://web-cdn.bsky.app/profile/brandonhoang.bsky.social|title=Brandon Hoàng|website=Bluesky}}</ref>
